abstract: John Paintsil (born 15 June 1981 in Berekum) is a Ghanaian professional footballer, who plays in the South African National First Division for Santos and the Ghana national team.His family name is Paintsil but at birth, it was registered as Pantsil. This then appeared on his passport and his registration with the Premier League.

This then appeared on his passport and his registration with the Premier League.
